metadata.title: CVE-2023-22725 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package. Versions 0.6.0 andabove, prior to 10.0.6 are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting. Thisvulnerability allow for an administrator to create a malicious externallink. This issue is patched in 10.0.6.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
